capabilities.name: expandSchema
capabilities.description: Expand the input schema for a tool before calling the tool

capabilities.name: createexplanation
capabilities.description: Explains a document in any language

capabilities.name: listknowledgebases
capabilities.description: Returns a list of Knowledge Bases.

capabilities.name: chatwithknowledgebase
capabilities.description: Creates a Knowledge Base Chat Response for the given Messages.

capabilities.name: addknowledgebasesources
capabilities.description: Adds Sources to a Knowledge Base.

capabilities.name: listknowledgebasesources
capabilities.description: Returns a list of Knowledge Base Sources.

capabilities.name: deleteknowledgebasesource
capabilities.description: Removes a Knowledge Base Source from a Knowledge Base.

capabilities.name: createsource
capabilities.description: Creates a Document or Text Source

capabilities.name: getsourcecontent
capabilities.description: Retrieves the content of a Source.

capabilities.name: deleteproject
capabilities.description: Deletes a Project and all its associated resources.

capabilities.name: createextraction
capabilities.description: Extracts structured data from a Document

capabilities.name: createclassification
capabilities.description: Classifies a Document into labels based on its content.
